dynamic_line.yes: Hey, you'll need some ammo to survive out there. What kind of ammo do you like? You prefer hand-reloaded, or military standard?
dynamic_line.no: Hey, you'll need some ammo to survive out there. What kind of ammo do you like? You prefer hand-reloaded, or military standard?

responses.text: Is there anything I can help with?
I have came here to trade.
